description: Bot event occuring, when a bot collides with another bot

bot-id.description: Unique id of the bot that got hit

damage.description: Damage inflicted by hitting the bot

energy.description: Remaining energy level of the bot that got hit

position.description: Position (x, y) of the bot that got hit

self-damage.description: Self damage inflicted by hitting the bot

rammed.description: Flag specifying, if the another bot was rammed
